hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Amr bin Shu'aib, from his father, that his grandfather said:"When the Messenger of Allah conquered Makkah, he stood up to address (the people) and said in his Khutbah: 'It is not permissible for a woman to give (a gift) except with her husband's permission

chapter.ara-name: باب عَطِيَّةِ الْمَرْأَةِ بِغَيْرِ إِذْنِ زَوْجِهَا .
chapter.eng-name: A Woman Giving A Gift Without Her Husband's Permission
